infoPoint.itemDesc: What mysteries are projected onto it?? We'll never know
This specialist lab is equipped for ethical hacking! A custom private network and VMs allows students to learn about Virus' and Malware
A fully custom network supports the cyber lab, we host numerous Virtual Machines for students to attempt to hack and break!
Not really a safe place to store a cake
This lab contains smart home tech, students can directly interact and manipulate kit through multiple APIs
The High Performance Computing kit powers research across the University.
This is a general computing lab, focused on multiple work flows to create and adaptable work space for students from multiple pathways.
This room is used for delivering content in a more traditional lecture style
I wonder what it does...
No one knows what this is...

The Computing Technical Team is based from this office, specializing within multiple areas within computing, the team provides direct support to students while also supporting teaching/research and much more!
Hmm... We'll assume that's used for research
One day we'll remember to water it correctly...
I wonder who sits here...
This lab is Engineering focused with specialist software... Unfortunatly this was written by someone from Computing, so I don't know much else about it.
This is an 87" 4K TV!! There's also two of them! Perfect for games ;)

This lab contains both MacOS devices and Windows devices, this allows testing across multiple platforms. The iMacs are also great for UI and UX work due to the high resolution, colour accurate displays.
This arcade machine has a windows PC for students to develop and play their games on arcade hardware!
Shouldn't really have food in here... although they do look good...
Should have gone to bed earlier...
Higher Spec PCs are available to push those graphical limits! Machine learning and CUDA programming is also another use I suppose...
Two dedicated VR spaces with green screen walls create an adaptable environment for VR/AR/XR workflows. There is also a dedicated space for Team working which is bookable by students.
The real ones are even bigger than this! We have this setup to allow for mixed reality capture for students to show off their work!
VR games require more powerful GPUs, and we always want to be able to run the latest VR games!
Its a cactus
Who is still using these?
